synopsis.text: Madoka Kaname and Sayaka Miki accompany Homura Akemi to Kamihama City to rescue their friend Mami Tomoe. However, they soon discover that Kamihama is facing turbulent times amidst a conflict between the Wings of Magius organization and those opposing its questionable actions. Yachiyo Nanami is searching for her missing friend Iroha Tamaki, suspecting the magical girl group to be behind her disappearance. Unexpected help in her search comes from an unlikely source. As perturbing events rapidly unfold, Homura, Madoka, Sayaka, Yachiyo and other companions both old and new join forces in an effort to counter the Wings of Magius' schemes. This recap covers the key events from the first seven episodes, setting the stage for the continuing dramatic story to unfold. With both new friendships and dangers in their path, the magical girls must stand united against the brewing storm.
synopsis.author: anthropic.claude-v2:1
